etymology.description: Depicts a cowrie shell which was used as currency in ancient China.
etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents a cowrie shell, linking it directly to its historical use as money. This makes it intuitive as currency symbolizing wealth and trade.

examples.english: I use cowries to buy things.

examples.chinese: 古代人用貝(古代人用贝)交易。
examples.english: Ancient people used cowries for trade.
